meanings.definition: An instance of two or more people coming together again after a period of separation.
meanings.sent1: The family reunion was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent2: The high school reunion brought back memories of the past.
meanings.sent3: At the reunion, everyone shared stories from their childhood.
meanings.sent4: The reunion felt like a warm embrace after years apart.
meanings.sent5: The reunion was a heartwarming gathering of old friends.

meanings.definition: The act of reuniting or the state of being reunited.
meanings.sent1: The reunion of the long-lost siblings was a tearful moment.
meanings.sent2: The reunion of the broken pieces brought back the complete picture.
meanings.sent3: The reunion of the lost keys with the owner was a relief.
meanings.sent4: The reunion of the scattered puzzle pieces completed the image.
meanings.sent5: The reunion of the separated lovers was a scene of pure happiness.
